title: Bought
description: Meet the new boss ... definitely not the same as the old boss.Ettore Zane, AKA Mr. Money AKA Billionaire "King of Sex", has just bought the company Allie Davis works for. Now she's his right-hand associate in his sex toy and club empire. And he has no problem mixing business with pleasure.Ettore also knows something Allie doesn't... her boyfriend is a cheat. And there is nothing he hates more...This is the first part of the "Mr. Money" series by Emily Cantore and is 17200 words long.
author: Emily Cantore
